item.title: Smithsonian
item.description: Take Aways Explore museum artifacts Parents can find content that can relate to school topics. Parents should curate the content as there is a lot for the kid to get overwhelmed

item.title: Time for Kids
item.description: Review Take Aways News magazine targeted for kids and covers current topics. Promote higher level thinking in kids with some content that is unique and though provoking Age appropriate content https://www.timeforkids.com/g2/ https://www.timeforkids.com/k1/ https://www.timeforkids.com/g34/ https://www.timeforkids.com/g56/
